name: Danger Beat (LD47)
description:
TURN VOLUME UP!

Please rate here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/danger-beat

--------

WASD to move.

SPACE and P to pause (and CHANGE the difficulty).

COLLECT records to add a BEAT and turn ON a TURRET.

get HIT and lose a BEAT and a TURRET turns OFF.

try and complete the ENTIRE TRACK and see how long you can last!

--------

there is no score or timer for my LD entry, so just keep track of it yourself if you want :)

--------

Credits:

Audio Samples - http://sampulator.com/

The Rest - me
